Physical & Strength Skills.name: Strength
Physical & Strength Skills.description: Ability to lift heavy objects, perform physically demanding tasks, and build muscular power.

Physical & Strength Skills.name: Endurance
Physical & Strength Skills.description: Ability to sustain physical effort for long periods without getting tired.

Physical & Strength Skills.name: Agility
Physical & Strength Skills.description: Ability to move quickly, change direction, and react fast with balance and control.

Physical & Strength Skills.name: Flexibility
Physical & Strength Skills.description: Ability to stretch, bend, and move body parts through a full range of motion.

Physical & Strength Skills.name: Stamina
Physical & Strength Skills.description: Ability to maintain energy and resist fatigue during prolonged activity.

Mental & Cognitive Skills.name: Perception
Mental & Cognitive Skills.description: Sharpen your observation skills, situational awareness, and attention to detail.

Mental & Cognitive Skills.name: Memory
Mental & Cognitive Skills.description: Improve ability to recall information, facts, and past experiences accurately.

Mental & Cognitive Skills.name: Problem-Solving
Mental & Cognitive Skills.description: Ability to analyze situations, think logically, and find effective solutions.

Mental & Cognitive Skills.name: Creativity
Mental & Cognitive Skills.description: Ability to generate innovative ideas, think outside the box, and create new things.

Communication & Social Skills.name: Conversation
Communication & Social Skills.description: Develop fluency, clarity, and confidence in speaking with others.

Communication & Social Skills.name: Persuasion
Communication & Social Skills.description: Ability to influence, negotiate, and convince people effectively.

Communication & Social Skills.name: Listening
Communication & Social Skills.description: Become better at active listening, understanding others, and responding thoughtfully.

Communication & Social Skills.name: Charisma
Communication & Social Skills.description: Work on body language, storytelling, and projecting a confident presence.

Discipline & Productivity Skills.name: Time Management
Discipline & Productivity Skills.description: Plan your day efficiently and prioritize tasks effectively.

Discipline & Productivity Skills.name: Self-Discipline
Discipline & Productivity Skills.description: Improve focus, consistency, and control over your habits.

Discipline & Productivity Skills.name: Adaptability
Discipline & Productivity Skills.description: Get better at handling unexpected challenges and changes.

Education & Knowledge Skills.name: Learning Ability
Education & Knowledge Skills.description: Improve how quickly and effectively you can understand new topics.

Education & Knowledge Skills.name: Strategy & Planning
Education & Knowledge Skills.description: Develop ability to create long-term plans and execute them efficiently.

Extra Skills.name: Focus
Extra Skills.description: Ability to concentrate deeply on tasks without distraction.

Extra Skills.name: Emotional Control
Extra Skills.description: Manage your emotions and reactions in different situations.

Extra Skills.name: Critical Thinking
Extra Skills.description: Evaluate information objectively and make reasoned judgments.

Extra Skills.name: Leadership
Extra Skills.description: Guide, motivate, and influence others towards a goal.
